mapper.update:
update lineinfo
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_name = #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_direction = #{lineDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_mileage = #{startMileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
end_mileage = #{endMileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
extension_length = #{extensionLength,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rail_laying_date = #{railLayingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
rail_type = #{railType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_year_pass_weight = #{preYearPassWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
min_yearly_inspection_number = #{minYearlyInspectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
find_severe_wound = #{findSevereWound,jdbcType=INTEGER},
existing_wound_number = #{existingWoundNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wound_rate = #{woundRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
current_rail_status_evaluate = #{currentRailStatusEvaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yearly_inspection_number = #{yearlyInspectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inspection_area_insp_block_number = #{inspectionAreaInspBlockNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
responsible_inspeciton_area = #{responsibleInspecitonArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update lineinfo set id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line_name = #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line_direction = #{lineDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_mileage = #{startMileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, end_mileage = #{endMileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, extension_length = #{extensionLength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rail_laying_date = #{railLayingDate,jdbcType=DATE}, rail_type = #{railType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_year_pass_weight = #{preYearPassWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, min_yearly_inspection_number = #{minYearlyInspectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, find_severe_wound = #{findSevereWound,jdbcType=INTEGER}, existing_wound_number = #{existingWoundNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wound_rate = #{woundRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, current_rail_status_evaluate = #{currentRailStatusEvaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yearly_inspection_number = #{yearlyInspectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inspection_area_insp_block_number = #{inspectionAreaInspBlockNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, responsible_inspeciton_area = #{responsibleInspecitonArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
